title: Butter bean houmous & cumin-roasted carrot flatbreads

ingredients.item: 500g Essential Carrots, trimmed, peeled and halved
1 tbsp Essential Olive Oil, plus 2 tsp
1 tsp maple syrup or Essential Clear Honey
400g can Essential Butter Beans, drained and rinsed
¼ tsp hot smoked paprika, plus extra to serve

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Toss the carrots with 2 tsp of the oil, the cumin seeds and maple syrup (or honey). Scatter in a parchment-lined roasting tin and roast for 15-20 minutes, stirring halfway until golden and tender.

Place the remaining oil, butter beans, tahini, lemon juice, garlic and paprika in a small blender or food processor with 4 tbsp warm water. Season and blend until smooth. Add more water, salt and lemon juice as needed.

Heat the tortillas according to the pack instructions, then pile up with the houmous and roasted carrots. Scatter with a little more paprika, top with coriander leaves and serve each with a hot pepper.
